SEARCH
Package hms.ui

Class PaginatedList<T>

Object
PaginatedList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of items in the list.
public final class PaginatedList<T> extends Object
A class that represents a paginated list of items.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_ITEMS_PER_PAGE

      private static final int DEFAULT_ITEMS_PER_PAGE
      The default number of items displayed per page.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • itemsPerPage

      private final int itemsPerPage
      The number of items displayed per page.

    • items

      private final T[] items
      All items to paginate.

    • displayedItems

      private T[] displayedItems
      The items to display. This is a subset of items based on the search criteria and sorter.

    • pageCount

      private int pageCount
      The number of pages.

    • currentPage

      private int currentPage
      The current page number.

      The active search criteria for the list.

      The active sorter for the list.

      Create a new PaginatedList.
      Parameters:

      itemsPerPage - The number of items displayed per page.

  • Method Details

    • updateList

      public void updateList()
      Update the list based on the search criteria and sorter.

    • getItem

      public T getItem(int index)
      Get the item at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the item to get. Starts from 0.
      Returns:
      The item at the specified index.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index is invalid.

    • hasPreviousPage

      public boolean hasPreviousPage()
      Check if there is a previous page.
      Returns:
      true if there is a previous page, false otherwise.

    • hasNextPage

      public boolean hasNextPage()
      Check if there is a next page.
      Returns:
      true if there is a next page, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPage

      public int getCurrentPage()
      Get the current page number.
      Returns:
      The current page number. Starts from 0.

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Get the total number of pages.
      Returns:
      The total number of pages.

    • setCriteria

      public void setCriteria(List<SearchCriterion<T,?>> criteria)
      Set the search criteria for the list. If the criteria is null, the list will not be filtered.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The search criteria to set.

    • addCriteria

      public void addCriteria(SearchCriterion<T,?> criterion)
      Add a search criterion to the list.
      Parameters:
      criterion - The search criterion to add.

    • setSorter

      public void setSorter(Function<T,? extends Comparable<?>> sorter)
      Set the sorter for the list. If the sorter is null, the list will not be sorted.
      Parameters:
      sorter - The sorter to set.

    • nextPage

      public void nextPage()
      Go to the next page.

    • previousPage

      public void previousPage()
      Go to the previous page.

    • goToPage

      public void goToPage(int page)
      Go to a specific page.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number to go to. Starts from 0.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the page number is invalid.

    • isValidPage

      public boolean isValidPage(int page)
      Check if the specified page number is valid.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number to check. Starts from 0.
      Returns:
      true if the page number is valid, false otherwise.
